imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Game background with dynamic gradient or abstract pattern (game-background.dim_1920x1080.png)
- Player character or game piece sprite illustration (player-sprite.dim_128x128.png)
- Game element or obstacle graphic (game-element.dim_96x96.png)

existing_features.title: Create a playable game with interactive gameplay mechanics that responds to user input
Design a distinctive visual theme with cohesive colors, typography, and layout that creates an engaging gaming atmosphere
Implement score tracking and persistence so players can see their current score and high scores are saved between sessions
Render generated game assets including background images, character sprites, or game element graphics as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
